outcome.title: Sentences
outcome.description: Identfiy whether given sentences are statements, open sentences, or neither.

outcome.title: Identify Statement Combinations
outcome.description: Identify given compound and (bi)conditional statements, and determine their truth values.

outcome.title: Statement Manipulations
outcome.description: Write negations of compound and conditional statements, and write converses, inverses, and contrapositives of implications.

outcome.title: Evaluate Statement Combinations
outcome.description: Write negations of combinations of compound and conditional statements, and determine their truth values.

outcome.title: Existential and Universal Quantifiers
outcome.description: Write negations of quantified statements and determine their truth values.

outcome.title: Set Notation
outcome.description: Use set list and set builder notation to describe solution sets simple sets of real numbers.

outcome.title: Set Combinations
outcome.description: Illustrate operations (intersections, unions, complements, differences, cardinalities) on finite sets of letters using Venn diagrams, and compute results.

outcome.title: Membership and Subsets
outcome.description: Validate membership and subset relations for sets and power sets of integers.

outcome.title: Cartesian Products
outcome.description: Illustrate Cartesian products and squared sets, and describe them using set notation.

outcome.title: Intersections and Unions
outcome.description: Express finite intersections and unions of intervals using big operators and index sets, and compute their results.

outcome.title: Direct Proofs
outcome.description: Write direct proofs for simple set-theoretic conditional statements.

outcome.title: Proofs of Contrapositives
outcome.description: Write proofs for contrapositives of simple set-theoretic conditional statements.

outcome.title: Proofs by Contradiction
outcome.description: Write proofs by contradiction for simple set-theoretic conditional statements.

outcome.title: Biconditional Proofs
outcome.description: Express set equality as a biconditional statement, and prove such statements.

outcome.title: Existence and Constructive Proofs
outcome.description: Write and distinguish between existence and constructive proofs.

outcome.title: Sigma Notation
outcome.description: Evaluate sums given in sigma notation, and convert finite sums into sigma notation.
